category: news
title: "Wipro GE Healthcare launches ‘Made in India’ AI-enabled Cath lab"
excerpt: "GE Healthcare, a medical technology, diagnostics, and digital solutions company, launched its ‘Made in India’, ‘AI-powered’ Cath lab-Optima IGS 320 to advance cardiac care in India. It is built at Wipro GE Healthcare’s new Bengaluru factory and leverages the GE proprietary AutoRight technology."
